*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, Mexico, October 2, 1833. Distress over losses from cholera in Texas. Despondent over disorders and revolutions in Mexico,*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="10-02-1833">October 2 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I am so much afflicted by accounts of the deaths by cholera in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* that I can scarcely write anything. I have heard of *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned*, his *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*child */person_mentioned*and of my [dear?] *person_mentioned*sister's daughter Mary*/person_mentioned*. . . . *person_mentioned*Cap. Martin*/person_mentioned*. Good God what a blow. And whether it has taken you all off is uncertain. I am too wretched to write much on this subject or any other.*/p*
*p*I left with *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*a great number of deeds signed by me so that he might furnish all the titles of the . . . *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*. Take possession of them and of all my papers. Should these blanks fall into bad hands they will make any use of them they please.*/p*
*p*I will try and get home as soon as I can. There has been no meeting of *person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*since early in *date_mentioned n="08-xx-1833">August */date_mentioned*until a few days since, so that nothing is done. I shall wait but a short time longer. I am tired of this *person_mentioned*government*/person_mentioned*. They are always in revolution and I believe always will be. I have had much more respect for them than they deserve. But I am done with all that. You do not write to me [no one] writes to me. farewell*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] Al *person_mentioned*Sor J. F. Perry*/person_mentioned* del Comercio *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
